name: HODL King
description:
HODL King is for the true hard-core believers. HODL is not just a strategy, it is a choice, it is a mindset, it is a way of life. HODLers reign and they need a dramatic costume to match their throne. 

The splendour of regal status oozes through this tailored long gown of Venetian damask. This extravagant design is built for show; red embroidered satin, silver tissue, and cloth of gold. It’s time to take the crown— it’s HODL time.
